title: Russia launches hundreds of drones at Ukraine just hours after Putin-Trump call - Europe live
description: All-night attack on Kyiv injured at least 23 people, damaging railway infrastructure and setting buildings and cars on fire throughout the city

title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold and Flip 7 launching in 6 days, everything we know so far
description: Samsung is set to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Flip 7 on July 9. Here's a quick round-up of all the leaks so far, including design, specs, and colour options.
content: We’re just days away from Samsung’s next big Galaxy Unpacked event, which is scheduled for July 9 in New York. And while the company hasn’t confirmed anything officially, leaks and rumours have already given us a pretty clear picture of what’s coming... [2692 chars]
